Text: Really nice edit and good quality too!
Yeah it took me awhile. And I thought while I was doing it, might as well make it the best quality.
MPEG? Could you encode to MKV or XviD?

I encoded the file to the same format that I used to rip from my discs. I decided that I spent enough time splicing and re-editing that I didn't want to tie my computer up for re-encode. You're welcome to do it yourself, but at this point, I got it where I want it and don't want to compress it or change it.
Wow! Love it!! While writing a review for a site, I was actually amazed this is NOT an official version. Comparing it to the 'standard' versions, having it like this is way superior. Thanks man!
@egregius- thanks for the review. I appreciate it.
